<noinclude>
This is the Photocatalytic CO2 conversion template.
</noinclude>
<includeonly><tr>
<td>{{DisplayMolecule|{{{catalyst|}}} }}</td>

<td>{{{additives|}}}</td>

<td property="hidden">{{{feedstock volume|}}}</td>

<td property="hidden">{{{pH|}}}</td>

<td>{{{λexc|}}}</td>

<td>{{{Turnover_number__H2|}}}</td>

<td>{{{Turnover_number__HCOOH|}}}</td>

<td>{{{Turnover_number__MeOH|}}}</td>

<td property="hidden">{{#calculateSelectivity:{{{Turnover_number__CO|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__CH4|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__H2|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__HCOOH|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__MeOH|0}}} }}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{DisplayNumberNotNull|{{#expr: {{#qvalue:{{{Quantum_yield__CO|0}}} }} + {{#qvalue:{{{Quantum_yield__CH4|0}}} }} + {{#qvalue:{{{Quantum_yield__H2|0}}} }} + {{#qvalue:{{{Quantum_yield__HCOOH|0}}} }} + {{#qvalue:{{{Quantum_yield__MeOH|0}}} }} }} }}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{details|}}}</td>
<td resource="include" property="hidden">{{{include|}}}</td>
<td>{{#subobject:
 |Catalyst={{{catalyst|}}}
 |Catalyst concentration={{{cat conc|}}}
 |Photosensitizer={{{PS|}}}
 |Photosensitizer concentration={{{PS conc|}}}
 |Electron donor={{{e-D|}}}

 |Solvent A={{{solvent A|}}}
 |Solvent B={{{solvent B|}}}
 |Solvent C={{{solvent C|}}}
 |Solvent ratio={{{solvent-ratio|}}}
 |Additives={{{additives|}}}
 |Additives concentration={{{additives conc|}}}
 |Feedstock gas={{{feedstock gas|}}}
 |Feedstock volume={{{feedstock volume|}}}
 |Intensity={{{intensity|}}}
 |PH value={{{pH|}}}
 |TemperatureP={{{Temperature|}}}
 |Excitation wavelength={{{λexc|}}}
 |Irradiation time={{{irr time|}}}
 |Turnover number at={{{Turnover_number__CO|}}}; CO
 |Turnover number at={{{Turnover_number__CH4|}}}; CH4
 |Turnover number at={{{Turnover_number__H2|}}}; H2
 |Turnover number at={{{Turnover_number__HCOOH|}}}; HCOOH
 |Turnover number at={{{Turnover_number__MeOH|}}}; MeOH
 |Turnover frequency at={{{Turnover_frequency__CO|}}}; CO
 |Turnover frequency at={{{Turnover_frequency__CH4|}}}; CH4
 |Turnover frequency at={{{Turnover_frequency__H2|}}}; H2
 |Turnover frequency at={{{Turnover_frequency__HCOOH|}}}; HCOOH
 |Turnover frequency at={{{Turnover_frequency__MeOH|}}}; MeOH
 |Quantum yield at={{{Quantum_yield__CO|}}}; CO
 |Quantum yield at={{{Quantum_yield__CH4|}}}; CH4
 |Quantum yield at={{{Quantum_yield__H2|}}}; H2
 |Quantum yield at={{{Quantum_yield__HCOOH|}}}; HCOOH
 |Quantum yield at={{{Quantum_yield__MeOH|}}}; MeOH
 |Quantum yield total={{{Φ all|}}}
 |Selectivity={{{selectivity|}}}
 |Selectivity at={{SelectivityForOne|{{{Turnover_number__CO|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__CO|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__CH4|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__H2|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__HCOOH|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__MeOH|0}}} }}; CO
 |Selectivity at={{SelectivityForOne|{{{Turnover_number__CH4|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__CO|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__CH4|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__H2|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__HCOOH|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__MeOH|0}}} }}; CH4
 |Selectivity at={{SelectivityForOne|{{{Turnover_number__H2|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__CO|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__CH4|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__H2|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__HCOOH|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__MeOH|0}}} }}; H2
 |Selectivity at={{SelectivityForOne|{{{Turnover_number__HCOOH|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__CO|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__CH4|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__H2|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__HCOOH|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__MeOH|0}}} }}; HCOOH
 |Selectivity at={{SelectivityForOne|{{{Turnover_number__MeOH|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__CO|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__CH4|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__H2|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__HCOOH|0}}}|{{{Turnover_number__MeOH|0}}} }}; MeOH
 |Details={{{details|}}}
 |Included={{{include|}}}
 |BasePageName={{BASEPAGENAME}}
}}</td></tr></includeonly>
